channel.title: Trouble running my client
channel.description:
Hello, im very very VERY new to the world of owning and managing my own server. Im saying this because I have no clue if this is a stupid question or not, but please don't get too angry with me lol.
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Jframe : Unsu pported major.minor version 51.0 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
This is the problem I keep getting while trying to run the client! It may be an easy fix, I have no clue lol. Any help is greatly appreciated thank you!

item.title: Trouble running my client
item.dc:creator: @skiersk8tr1 skiersk8tr1
item.description:
@skiersk8tr1 wrote:

Are you on vista?

Download jdk, google it

Cancel the installation when it starts then look for the download

Right click it and select “run as administrator”

Post your run and compile code please

Read full topic

item.title: Trouble running my client
item.dc:creator: @Vexare Vexare
item.description:
@Vexare wrote:

I downloaded it, and it says that to run it/install it i need to log into an account with administrative privlages? Although i already kno the administrative password.

Read full topic

item.title: Trouble running my client
item.dc:creator: @rt-gamer rt-gamer
item.description:
@rt-gamer wrote:

Try to download the newest java, and let it run on that.

Read full topic

item.title: Trouble running my client
item.dc:creator: @Vexare Vexare
item.description:
@Vexare wrote:

Hello, im very very VERY new to the world of owning and managing my own server. Im saying this because I have no clue if this is a stupid question or not, but please don’t get too angry with me lol.

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Jframe : Unsu
pported major.minor version 51.0
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)

at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

This is the problem I keep getting while trying to run the client! It may be an easy fix, I have no clue lol. Any help is greatly appreciated thank you!
